analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: The 50.0 GMS pivot defines a regime of fragility where upward OGV vectors clash with elevated VIX levels. While fiscal liquidity bolsters the monetary nexus, widening HY spreads and stagnant momentum necessitate a tactical pause to preserve capital. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.EN: The 50.0 GMS pivot defines a regime of fragility where upward OGV vectors clash with elevated VIX levels. While fiscal liquidity bolsters the monetary nexus, widening HY spreads and stagnant momentum necessitate a tactical pause to preserve capital. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]
